item1_summary:
Block is building an ecosystem dedicated to economic empowerment and unlocking access to the financial system for people around the world . Our brands work together cohesively, often positively reinforcing one another and creating resonant relationships with people who use our products to meet multiple needs across the different aspects of their lives . As we scale, we are focused on investing in investing in building deeper connections between our ecosystems and increasing the resilience of our company .
 Cash App's goal is to redefine the world’s relationship with money by making it more relatable, instantly available, and universally accessible . Square combines software, hardware, and financial services to create products and services that are cohesive, fast, self-serve, and elegant . TIDAL expands its purpose of economic empowerment to artists .
 TIDAL offers an extensive catalog of more than 162 million songs and 927,000 high-quality videos . Square sellers represent a diverse range of industries (including services, food-related, and retail businesses) and sizes . We believe our bitcoin ecosystem can help address inefficiencies in the current financial system, especially with respect to identity and trust .
 More than 4 million sellers used the Square ecosystem to make 5.2 billion individual sales transactions totaling $228 billion of Square GPV . In 2024, Cash App was the number one finance app on Google Play and the number two finance apps on iOS based on downloads in the United States . Cash App has 57 million monthly transacting actives across the U.S. as of December 2024 .
 Square consists of more than 30 distinct software, hardware, and financial services products . Our products are designed to be self-serve and intuitive to make initial setup and new employee training fast and easy . We monetize these products through a combination of transaction, subscription, and service fees . We believe the breadth and depth of our products and services provide us unique advantages in best serving the needs of our sellers through a holistic view of their businesses .
 Square's go-to-market strategy is focused on verticals with a local approach, specifically restaurants and services-based businesses . Our robust banking offering primarily helps our sellers manage cash flow and grow their business through our lending capabilities . We are focused on enabling growth by leveraging AI to increase productivity and outcomes for our sales and marketing, customer service, and engineering efforts .
 Square has modernized and simplified its Point of Sale applications, combining our vertical software solutions into one Square app . The app now includes: a vertical solution tailored for both quick-service and full-service restaurants . It is also integrated with Square Assistant, an AI-enabled automated messaging tool designed to respond to buyers efficiently and professionally, saving sellers' time .
 Square Online Checkout makes it easy to sell online without a website by allowing sellers to create a checkout link with only a name and price . Fulfillment options include pickup, delivery managed by our sellers, and integrations with partner delivery platforms . The system is designed for orders, items, inventory, and customer data to stay in sync when selling both online and in-person .
 Square's In-App Payments SDK enables developers to build consumer mobile apps that use Square to process payments . These products are monetized primarily through transaction fees on payment volumes . For card payments, Square acts as the merchant of record for the transaction as well as the payment service provider (“PSP”)
 Square can offer sellers integrated omnichannel capabilities to acquire, engage, and retain customers . Most of our Square software products have a free tier (without a subscription fee), which we monetize only through transaction fees on card payments . We typically monetize these products via service and software fees . Most software products also have premium tiers with additional functionality .
 Square's staff management products give sellers digital tools to streamline their operations . These tools are designed to seamlessly integrate with other Square products eliminating the latent, time-consuming, and error-prone processes typically used to copy and sync data between disparate systems . Square Payroll allows sellers to pay wages and associated employee taxes, and offer employee benefits (e.g. 401(k) accounts)
 Since its public launch in May 2014, Square Loans has facilitated more than 3.1 million loans and advances, representing more than $25.8 billion in principal amount . Square Checking gives sellers instant access to their sales and the ability to immediately use those funds via a debit card (Square Debit Card), withdraw funds from an ATM, or transfer funds via ACH . Square Credit Card in 2023 to provide another lending option to qualified Square sellers .
 Square custom-designs hardware that can process all major card payment forms, including magnetic stripe, EMV chip, and NFC (contactless) Sellers are able to accept cards issued by Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, JCB, Interac Flash (in Canada), e-Money (in Japan), and eftpos (in Australia) Square hardware can be integrated with additional accessories such as cash drawers, receipt printers, scales, and barcode scanners .
 Cash App aims to become one of the top providers of banking services to households in the United States that earn up to $150,000 per year . The majority of our near term focus and current investments are on Banking our Base, the first part of our strategy, where we see the most direct opportunity to drive meaningful top-line growth for Cash App .
 Cash App offers a compelling financial services offering to eligible customers that utilize direct deposit on a monthly basis, including an attractive savings rate, free in-network ATM withdrawals, free overdraft coverage up to a certain amount . We plan to continue launching additional products and features to strengthen our value proposition and also to invest in incentives and marketing to drive awareness and adoption of direct deposit .
 Customers can use Cash App to inflow funds in a variety of ways, including by receiving money from another Cash App customer through the app’s core peer-to-peer transfer service, transferring money from a bank account, depositing mobile checks, adding physical cash at participating retailers, receiving a recurring paycheck by direct deposit, and through other inflow channels .
 Customers can order a Cash App Card for free and use it anywhere that accepts Visa cards to make purchases . Customers can also purchase and send gift cards at specific merchants to other customers . Cash App earns interchange fees when individuals make purchases with their cash App Card . Customers also receive their recurring paycheck, tax refund, or government disbursement into their Cash App account .
 Cash App Borrow, our first credit product for consumers, allows customers to access short-term loans for a small fee . The product offers eligible Cash App customers up to $1,000 at any one time that they can pay back in scheduled installments or as a percentage of what they receive into Cash App . Customers can split purchases into generally three or four installments, typically due in two-week increments, without paying fees .
 The Afterpay Card allows consumers to shop in-store at Afterpay merchants and is free for the consumer . We pay retail merchants the full order value up front (less a percentage fee) and assume the risk of non-payment . Afterpay Plus Card is currently available to select Afterpay consumers in certain regions for a monthly fee .
 Customers are able to instantly transfer funds from Cash App to a bank account for a small fee . Cash App Pay allows customers to seamlessly pay with a Cash App account at participating merchants like DoorDash, Lyft, Google Play Store, Temu, and many more, including thousands of Square sellers . We charge a fee to the sender when transactions are funded using a credit card, and the recipient if it is a business account .
 Cash App allows U.S. actives to send and receive bitcoin to/from anyone with a compatible wallet via the Lightning Network . The Lightning Network is a second layer technology applied to the bitcoin blockchain that enables faster transactions with little to no fees . Cash App can help bitcoin evolve beyond an asset class and enable transactional utility .
 Direct marketing, online and offline, has also been an effective marketing channel . In addition to direct channels, we work with third-party developers and other partners who offer our solutions to their customers . We use various scalable communication channels such as email marketing, in-product notifications and messaging, to increase the awareness and usage of our products .
 Cash App has also developed a strong brand, which can be traced back to our compelling features, self-serve experience, unique design, and engaging marketing . Peer-to-peer transactions serve as the primary acquisition channel for Cash App . Cash App also uses paid marketing, including referrals, advertising spend, partnerships, and social media campaigns, to expand its network .
 Cash App Card and Offers rewards, bitcoin buying and selling, investing in stocks and ETFs, Cash App Pay, and a tax preparation service enhance Cash App’s utility for customers . Our products and services are platform-agnostic with most supporting iOS, Android, and web . Our services are built on a scalable technology platform, and we place a strong emphasis on data analytics .
 We compete primarily on our differentiated lifestyle brand, the breadth of our network, the range of products in our ecosystem, and the simplicity and quality of our customer experience . We differentiate ourselves by offering transparent pricing, no long-term contracts, and our ability to innovate and reshape the industries we operate in to expand access to traditionally unserved or underserved sellers . Competitors that overlap with certain functions and features that we provide include those that provide point of sale, business software providers .
 It is our practice to enter into confidentiality, non-disclosure, and invention assignment agreements with our employees and contractors . We also rely on a combination of trademarks, trade dress, copyrights, registered domain names, trade secrets, and patent rights to help protect our brand and our other intellectual property . We intend to file additional patent applications as we continue to innovate through our research and development efforts .
 Various laws and regulations govern the payments industry in the U.S. and globally . Failure to comply with these requirements may result in revocation of required licenses or registrations, loss of approved status, private litigation, regulatory or governmental investigations, sanctions, civil and criminal liability, monetary penalties, and constraints on our ability to continue to operate .
 We are subject to anti-money laundering, anti-corruption, and economic and trade sanctions laws and regulations in the United States and other jurisdictions in which we operate . We are licensed as an Electronic Money Institution to provide payments services and electronic money in the U.K. and in the EU by the Central Bank of Ireland .
 Square Capital, LLC holds and maintains lending and collections licenses with state regulators to support lending products offered across the United States . The opening of Square Financial Services, Inc., our ILC, in March 2021 subjects us to direct state and federal regulatory supervision . Our partnerships with FDIC-insured financial institutions to offer certain lending products to customers also subject us to certain federal banking regulations .
 Our lending services have been and may continue to be subject to regulation by other applicable authorities or jurisdictions . We are subject to certain licensing and supervisory frameworks as a result of our Cash App offering, through which customers can use their stored funds to buy, hold and sell bitcoin, and transfer bitcoin to and from Cash App . We currently hold a New York State BitLicense and a Virtual Currency Business License .
 This aspect of our business, including the collection, use, disclosure, and protection of the information we acquire from our own services as well as from third-party sources, is subject to laws and regulations in the United States, the European Union, and elsewhere . We publish our privacy policies and terms of service, which describe our practices concerning the use, transmission, and disclosure of information .
 Cash App ecosystem has experienced improvements in revenue, gross profit, and inflows related to the distribution of government funds . Hardware revenue generally demonstrates less seasonality than transaction-based revenue . Bitcoin revenue, which is driven by customer demand and the current market price of bitcoin, may not be indicative of future performance . Certain products within Cash App may also experience stronger fourth quarters and weaker first quarters .
 Block has a purpose-driven culture, with a focus on employee input and well-being, which we believe enables us to attract and retain exceptional talent . Our distributed work model means that we no longer have a designated headquarters location . In 2024, we established company-wide manager expectations, including their responsibility to break down silos and hierarchy .
 Block was incorporated in Delaware in June 2009 . In 2020, we adopted a distributed work model and we no longer have a designated headquarters location . The information contained in, or accessible through, our website (including any referenced reports or documents) is not part of or incorporated into, this Annual Report on Form 10-K .
 We have used, and intend to continue to use, our investor relations website, as well as the X (formerly known as Twitter) accounts @Blocks and @BlockIR, as means of disclosing material non-public information . The contents of our websites are not intended to be incorporated by reference into this Annual Report on Form 10-K or in any other report or document we file with the SEC .
